scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./node_modules/patternfly/dist/sass --include-path ./node_modules/patternfly/node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/stylesheets --include-path ./node_modules/patternfly/node_modules/font-awesome-sass/assets/stylesheets src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
